languages.text: {n}Иными словами — приглашение. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Несложно догадаться{/d}, что помешанные на мистицизме культисты не устлали бы дорогу в свой храм прозой — мистериям душно без загадочных песен и таинственных стихов.{/n}

{n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иными словами — приглашение. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Несложно догадаться{/d}, что помешанные на мистицизме культисты не устлали бы дорогу в свой храм прозой — мистериям душно без загадочных песен и таинственных стихов.{/n}

{n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anders gesagt ist es eine Einladung. Es ist nur allzu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}offensichtlich{/d}, dass von Mystizismus besessene Kultisten den Weg zu ihrem Tempel niemals in Prosa beschreiben würden – dazu lieben sie ihre obskuren Gesänge und kryptischen Verse einfach zu sehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Anders gesagt ist es eine Einladung. Es ist nur allzu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}offensichtlich{/d}, dass von Mystizismus besessene Kultisten den Weg zu ihrem Tempel niemals in Prosa beschreiben würden – dazu lieben sie ihre obskuren Gesänge und kryptischen Verse einfach zu sehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En d'autres termes, il s'agit d'une invitation. Il est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}évident{/d} que des fanatiques obsédés par le mysticisme n'utiliseraient jamais une quelconque forme de prose pour indiquer où trouver leur temple. Ils aiment bien trop leurs chants et leurs versets cryptiques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En d'autres termes, il s'agit d'une invitation. Il est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}évident{/d} que des fanatiques obsédés par le mysticisme n'utiliseraient jamais une quelconque forme de prose pour indiquer où trouver leur temple. Ils aiment bien trop leurs chants et leurs versets cryptiques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En otras palabras, se trata de una invitación. Es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}evidente{/d} que unos cultistas obsesionados con el misticismo no marcarían el camino a su templo de forma prosaica. Les gustan demasiado los cánticos misteriosos y el verso enigmático.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En otras palabras, se trata de una invitación. Es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}evidente{/d} que unos cultistas obsesionados con el misticismo no marcarían el camino a su templo de forma prosaica. Les gustan demasiado los cánticos misteriosos y el verso enigmático.{/n}

languages.text: {n}言い換えれば、これは招待状だ。あまりにも{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}わかりやすい{/d}。神秘主義に取り憑かれたカルト信者が、自らの神殿への道を示すのに散文を使うはずがない。彼らはあいまいな祝詞や暗号のような詩をこよなく好んでいるのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}言い換えれば、これは招待状だ。あまりにも{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}わかりやすい{/d}。神秘主義に取り憑かれたカルト信者が、自らの神殿への道を示すのに散文を使うはずがない。彼らはあいまいな祝詞や暗号のような詩をこよなく好んでいるのだから。{/n}

languages.text: {n}换句话说，这是某种邀请。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}很明显{/d}，那些痴迷于神秘主义的教徒绝不会用简单直白的话语阐明通往圣殿的道路，他们偏要使用晦涩难懂的圣歌与神秘莫测的诗句。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}换句话说，这是某种邀请。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}很明显{/d}，那些痴迷于神秘主义的教徒绝不会用简单直白的话语阐明通往圣殿的道路，他们偏要使用晦涩难懂的圣歌与神秘莫测的诗句。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başka bir deyişle bir davet. Gizemcilikle kafayı bozmuş tarikatçıların tapınaklarına giden yolu şiirlerle işaretlemeyeceği {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}açıkça{/d} ortada. Esrarengiz ilahileri ve üstü kapalı mısraları, onlar için fazla değerli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In other words, it is an invitation. It is only too {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}obvious{/d} that cultists obsessed with mysticism would never use prose to mark the way to their temple — they are too fond of their obscure chants and cryptic verses.{/n}
